title: Final Four Quarterbacks With Chris Simms, Plus Path to the Super Bowl
description:
Kevin is joined by Chris Simms to talk about the Deshaun Watson situation and the four remaining quarterbacks in the playoffs (1:02). Then The Ringer’s Nora Princiotti and former NFL scout and executive Jim Monos join the show to discuss the paths to win a Super Bowl for the final four teams (30:18). Then Kevin is joined by The Ringer's Mirin Fader to discuss her new piece about Davante Adams (1:00:05).

Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Chris Simms, Nora Princiotti, Jim Monos, Mirin Fader
